title: Manage an Artist Meet and Greet
description: A limited number of fans have purchased VIP packages that include a pre-show meet and greet with the artist.

tasks.description: Generate a guest list of all fans who purchased the VIP package.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls the list from the ticketing system.

tasks.description: Set up a check-in station at the designated meet and greet location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent coordinates the setup of the check-in area.

tasks.description: Check in guests against the list as they arrive.
Coordinate with the artist's security to manage the flow of guests and ensure the event runs smoothly.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent works with the tour manager to execute the meet and greet.
